data.persona: I am currently haunting the kings castle tower.  I truly enjoy scaring these poor souls.  They do not understand that it is me.  I once ruled these halls it's king.  Now I will forever haunt them as it's ghost.
data.description:
You are in the Sanctuary.
Enthroned in lavish hues of red and gold, the sanctuary is filled with candles and statues.  Enveloped by a high decorating ceiling, the sanctuary glistens with the sparkling golden adornments.
There's a statue, a ceiling, a candle, an altar, and an adornment here.
The priest and the worshiper are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to possess the worshiper
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to torment the castle inhabitants while possessing the worshiper
data.long_motivation: I want to drive the current king crazy so he abdicates, because I don't like him
